messages.title: RE-ELECT JEFF SMITH
messages.content: JEFF WILL CONTINUE TO FIGHT FOR A FAIR DEAL FOR MANCHESTER.

messages.title: Jeff says - Stop The Police Cuts
messages.content: Under the Tories and Liberal Democrats, Greater Manchester Police lost a quarter of its workforce. Jeff will fight for a properly funded Police Service.

messages.title: Jeff Smith - Representing You
messages.content: Jeff was born and bred in this area and has been proud to serve as your MP for the last two years.

messages.title: Your Choice This Thursday
messages.content: This election is about what sort of society we want to live in.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will recruit 10,000 new police officers.
Jeff will fight for fair funding for every school in South Manchester.
Jeff will oppose any Brexit deal that doesn't deliver for jobs and investment in Manchester.
Jeff will fight for investment in renewable energy and a low carbon future.
Labour created it, and we'll give the NHS the resources it needs.

issues.brexitEurope: Jeff will oppose any Brexit deal that doesn't deliver for jobs and investment in Manchester.
issues.education: Jeff will fight for fair funding for every school in South Manchester.
issues.environment: Jeff will fight for investment in renewable energy and a low carbon future.
issues.health: Labour created it, and we'll give the NHS the resources it needs.

leaflet.personalStatement: Jeff was born and bred in this area and has been proud to serve as your MP for the last two years.

politicalExperience.achievements: Jeff and his team have dealt with over 10,000 enquiries in just two years.

endorsements.endorser: Greater Manchester's new Mayor Andy Burnham
endorsements.endorsement: Jeff is a strong voice for south Manchester in parliament. I know he shares my concerns on homelessness, mental health and housing. I'm looking forward to working with him as your MP to tackle these issues.

images.caption: Jeff Smith with constituents and police officers.
